title: FEELS BAD MAN
body: {{item:3151}}  I keep getting the RADS error code, and it just started showing up out of no where, feelsbadman. (HELP){{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Can you let me know what the entire error says? RADS can be a disconnection from the server or a problem accessing specific files. If you give me a bit more detail, I can offer the right steps to take.

It says                           C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_patcher\releases\0.0.067\deplaylibcef.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or software vendor for support.

This could be caused by League not being assigned the right system permissions so it can run properly. League accesses and relies on a lot of files that reside outside the League install folder. I recommend working through the steps inside our [permissions guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
same if ufind a fix lemmy know tried everything
